title: Within the distance of 5 km
clause_text: Within the distance of 5 km. from the boundary of the site, no classified roads, MDR and above etc. shall be newly proposed. Upgradation of existing roads shall not be treated as new road.
section: 1.0 LAND USE CLASSIFICATION AND PERMISSIBLE USES

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
